name: Ninja from Hell vs. Reptiloids
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Ninja from Hell vs. Reptiloids - a classic clicker. In which you need to appease the ancient deity to save the world from destruction.

You act as a master of the ninja, who, for the sake of the deity, chops the unfaithful heretics.

Collect points, move on, only so, you will save the world from destruction!

But, be more careful! This deity does not forgive mistakes!

The world of reptilians is waiting for your help! Show your skills! Everything depends on you!
